harry_potter_section_04.txt

relationships.description: Harry acts as a financier/supporter for Fred and George.
relationships.evidence: Harry gives his 1000 Galleon Triwizard winnings to Fred and George to start their joke shop.

relationships.description: Fred and George are angry at Bagman for paying them with disappearing leprechaun gold.
relationships.evidence: Fred and George discuss blackmailing Bagman because he paid them with leprechaun gold that vanished.

relationships.description: Mrs. Figg watches over Harry in Little Whinging on Dumbledore's orders.
relationships.evidence: Mrs. Figg reveals she is a Squib and has been watching Harry for Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Sirius acts as Harry's godfather and guardian figure.
relationships.evidence: Sirius corresponds with Harry and offers his home as a refuge.
Sirius states, 'This was my parents' house... but I'm the last Black left, so it's mine now.'

relationships.description: The Order uses the house as headquarters.
relationships.evidence: The headquarters of the Order of the Phoenix may be found at number twelve, Grimmauld Place, London.

relationships.description: Kreacher is the house-elf of the Black family.
relationships.evidence: Kreacher lives to serve the noble house of Black.

relationships.description: Nymphadora is the daughter of Andromeda.
relationships.evidence: Sirius mentions Andromeda is Tonks's mother.
Sirius identifies Bellatrix as his cousin on the family tapestry.

relationships.description: Percy works as Junior Assistant to Fudge.
relationships.evidence: Percy has been promoted to Junior Assistant to the Minister.
